title: 07/06/21 DPS Hour 3 Ric Bucher
itunes:title: 07/06/21 DPS Hour 3 Ric Bucher
description:
Jason McIntyre and LaVar Arrington, in for Dan, question if the Bucks or Suns have enough of an identity for the spotlight of the NBA Finals. FS1 NBA Analyst Ric Bucher helps preview Game 1 and believes the Bucks are proving themselves worthy of the Finals without Giannis and the guys give their official picks for the series winner and MVP.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
